name: Seasick Sailors
description:
Description

Seasick Sailors is a co-operative game where you run around on a ship as two little toy sailors. Your goal is to avoid obstacles to reach the sandcastle as fast as possible while the waves rock your boat.

Controls

Keyboard:

Space: Interact with the oars and cancel interaction with the oars.

Arrows/WASD: control character and steer ship

Alt + f4: Close game

Controller:

X: Interact with the oars and cancel interaction with the oars.

Left Joystick: control character and steer ship

Team

Programming: Cas Trines, Bart van Dongen, Conor Damery Mendez

Visual Arts: Axel Cremers,  Kim Trouwborst, Roselyn Payne, Viktória Čižíková

Design: Andrei Gheorghe, Eileen van Zijtveld, Katelin van Lissum, Tudor Boneanu
